document_data.caption: A haidate as seen on a [[o-yoroi]] suit of armor.
document_data.name: Haidate
document_data.mainbody: A '''haidate''' was a type of [[armor]] used in [[Kara-Tur]].
document_data.Description: A haidate was an armored apron made from laced armor worn around the waist. It was made of large metal plates that hung loose below the waist. Its purpose was to protect the thighs and knees of an individual. It was designed to work with a [[do-maru]] or a [[hara-ate]].
